testimonials.name: Maria Santos
testimonials.text: I was nervous about learning to drive, but the instructors at WVDI made me feel so comfortable. I passed my LTO test on the first try! The free defensive driving lecture was incredibly helpful.

testimonials.name: Juan dela Cruz
testimonials.text: Best driving school in Negros! The hands-on car maintenance training is something you won't find anywhere else. Worth every peso.

testimonials.name: Ana Reyes
testimonials.text: After 10 years of not driving, I needed a refresher. Sir Martin was patient and helped me regain my confidence on the road. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Carlo Mendoza
testimonials.text: I got my professional license thanks to WVDI. The corporate training prepared me well for my job as a delivery driver. Very professional instructors.
